Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>、あんたのその尻尾の袋、 ずいぶんしゃれてるんだなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, <Eugene>, that covering you have on your tail is pretty spiffy.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、これか。これはガジュマにとって 尻尾用の帽子のような物だが……
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, that. To Gajuma, it's something analogous to a hat, but for one's tail...

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺のは王室や公式な場所でも通じる品だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Mine is the sort that is suitable for royalty and officials.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>って、意外と おしゃれさんなんだヨ。

Entry.EnglishText: I take it you're rather fond of it.

Entry.JapaneseText: ん、まあ……そのなんだ…… 紳士のみだしなみというやつだな……
Entry.EnglishText: Hm, well... That's... It's moreso about maintaining the appearance of a gentleman...
